package.name: Thevaultapp_Checkout_Magento1
package.summary: The Vault App payment processing for magento 1
package.description: The Vault App payment processing extension for Magento 1 enables Merchants to integrate The Vault App as a payment option into the customer checkout experience. Once a customer chooses The Vault App as their payment option, they receive SMS & Push notification instructions on their mobile device to approve or deny the transaction via The Vault App (ios & Android) and process their payment. The shopping cart is updated once the transaction is approved or denied, along with the Magento Admin Dashboard. Account & Pricing It is required to have a Client Account approved via www.thevaultapp.com/business/new to receive an API key and additional fees apply per transaction. The account is not created during installation. Features Mobile Authentication of a Customer before processing. Processes Visa / Mastercard globally. Enables the ability for a customer to checkout with "The Vault App" payment option, and be navigated to the app prior to processing a transaction
